definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: flesh (cf. Ar. ba4arun skin, Syr. besro0, As. bisûru, blood-relation, Dl:As. Stud. i. 143, cf. Pr 170, Sab. [[בשר תורם]] flesh of bulls)—Ge 2:21 + 126 t.; cstr. [[בְּשַׂר]] Ge 17:11 + 40 t.; sf. [[בּשָׂרִי]] etc. Ps 16:9 + 96 t.; pl. [[בְּשָׂרִים]] Pr 14:30; —

flesh for the body itself (esp. in P): [[על בשׂר אדם לא ייסך]] upon the body of man it shall not be poured Ex 30:32 (P); [[מכנסי בד ילבשׁ על בשׂרו]] linen drawers shall he put on his body Le 6:3, Le 16:4 (P); [[וישׂם שׂק]] [[על בשׂרו]] 1Ki 2:27; [[ורחץ את בשׂרו]] and he shall bath his body Le 14:9, Le 15:13, Le 15:16, Le 16:24, Le 16:26, Le 16:28, Le 17:16, Le 22:6, Nu 19:7, Nu 19:8 (P); [[שׂרט לנפשׁ לא תתנו בכשׂרכם]] ye shall not put any cutting for any one in your body Le 19:28 cf. Le 21:5 (P); [[והעבירו תער על כל בשׂרם]] and they shall pass a razor over all their body Nu 8:7 (P). Ec. uses [[בשׂר]] only in this sense Ec 2:3, Ec 4:5, Ec 5:5, Ec 11:10, Ec 12:12; elsewhere this usage only in poetry; the body antith. to [[נפשׁ]] Job 14:22, Is 10:18, Ps 63:2; [[לב]] Ps 16:9, Ps 84:3, Pr 14:30 (only here emphatic pl. = enṭire body Bö:§ 695, Leiblichkeit De) ; [[מִבְּשָׂרִי]] apart from my body, in disembodied state Job 19:26; [[סמר מפחדך בשׂרי]] my body trembleth for fear of thee Ps 119:120.

make organ of generation (euphemism): [[בְּשַׂר עָרְלַתְכֶם]] Ge 17:11, Ge 17:14, Ge 17:23, Ge 17:24, Ge 17:25 (P); [[בשׂר ערוה]] Ex 28:42 (P), but [[בשׂר]] Ge 17:14, Le 15:2-19 (P) Ez Eze 16:26, Eze 23:20, Eze 44:7, Eze 44:9.

flesh for kindred, blood-relations: [[עחם מעחמי ובשׂר מבשׂרי]] bone of my bone and flesh of my flesh Ge 2:23 (J); [[והיו לבשׂר אחד]] and they shall become one flesh Ge 2:24 (J); [[עחמי ובשׂרי]] Ge 29:14 (J) Ju Jdg 9:2, 2Sa 5:1, 2Sa 19:13, 2Sa 19:14, 1Ch 11:1; [[בשׂר]] with sf. in same sense Ge 37:27 (J) Ne 5:5, Is 58:7, for which [[שְׁאֵר בשׂרו]] near of kin, man or woman Le 18:6, Le 25:49 (both H; Le 25:49 ‖[[מִשְׁפָּחָה]], cf. RS k:149).
man over against God as frail or erring Ge 6:3 (J) Ps 56:5, Ps 78:39; eyes of flesh Job 10:4; arm of flesh 2Ch 32:8, Je 17:5; horses are flesh not spirit Is 31:3
